thread.title: You Have To See Kangana Ranaut Grooving to Rangoon’s Latest Song
thread.title_full: You Have To See Kangana Ranaut Grooving to Rangoon’s Latest Song

title: You Have To See Kangana Ranaut Grooving to Rangoon’s Latest Song
text:
facebook 711 SHARES 
On Wednesday evening, the third song from the much-awaited film of 2017, Rangoon , was released. The ditty titled, Mere Piya Gaye England , features Kangana Ranaut showing her dance moves, dressed in a desi avatar , while gyrating to yesteryear's track Mere Piya Gaye Rangoon (some alternations were made to the lyrics). The song is a tribute to the above mentioned popular number from the 1940's. 
The lyrics of this new song have been penned by Gulzar, and it has been sung by crooner Rekha Bhardwaj. The lyrics, to be fair, are funny and includes names of popular leaders (for all the wrong reasons) like Adolf Hitler and Winston Churchill. 
The trailer of the film released on January 6 and was hugely appreciated. Directed by National Award winning filmmaker, Vishal Bharadwaj, the period drama starring Shahid Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kangana Ranaut, is set against the backdrop of World War II. 
Shahid plays a soldier in the film, while Saif plays a filmmaker and mentor to a film star named Julia, which is played by Kangana. Rangoon is set to hit the screens on February 24.
